testcase.name: To enter the invalid credit card number
testcase.system-out: Given user launch Adactin application.......................................passed And user enter username and password........................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user see the next page Welcome to Adactin Group of Hotels...............passed And user enter the location,hotel,roomtype,numberofrooms....................passed And user enter the check in date and check out date.........................passed And user enter the adults per room,childrens per room.......................passed And user click search button................................................passed And user see the message next page of the select page.......................passed And user select the hotel...................................................passed And user click continue button..............................................passed When user enter the firstname,lastname,Address,invalid credit card number...passed And user select the credit card type,expiry month,expiry year,enter the cvv number.passed And user click book now button..............................................passed Then user see the error message.............................................passed
